item.title: How to make a exchanger npc
item.dc:creator: @ragefire ragefire
item.description:
@ragefire wrote:

Wait what do you mean? I’m trying to add it to Santa (npc 1552) buit I don’t know how to make choices connect with the codes so when they choose say “Trade raw beef” it takes teh raw beef and gives them the item instantly.

item.title: How to make a exchanger npc
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

else if (NPCID == ####) { if(playerHasItem(532, 15){ deleteItem(532, 15); addItem(995, 100000); sM("congragulations! you get some money for your hard work!"); }

else if (NPCID == ####) { if(playerHasItem(526, 15){ deleteItem(526, 15); addItem(995, 100000); sM("congragulations! you get some money for your hard work!"); }

else if (NPCID == ####) { if(playerHasItem(2132, 15){ deleteItem(2132, 15); addItem(995, 100000); sM("congragulations! you get some money for your hard work!"); }

Place these under a different “WanneShop” in the client class.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a exchanger npc

item.title: How to make a exchanger npc
item.dc:creator: @ragefire ragefire
item.description:
@ragefire wrote:

I am trying to make a npc where people can exchange items in for other items. I have 3 codes but I cant get an npc’s dialogue to fit with it, can someone please help me, here is the 3 codes for the item exchanges.

if(playerHasItem(2132, 15){
deleteItem(2132, 15);
addItem(995, 70000);
sM(“congragulations! you get some money for your hard work!”);

if(playerHasItem(526, 15){
deleteItem(526, 15);
addItem(995, 50000);
sM(“congragulations! you get some money for your hard work!”);

if(playerHasItem(532, 15){
deleteItem(532, 15);
addItem(995, 100000);
sM(“congragulations! you get some money for your hard work!”);

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a exchanger npc
